entry.title: sgilroy/AutoBodyHot
entry.summary: Automation and scheduling for a full body interactive installation with projectors and cameras

entry.title: CemuUser8/mouse2joystick_custom_CEMU
entry.summary: An AutoHotkey Script to allow the use of Mouse and Keyboard control in CEMU. This uses vJoy and provides several additional features over regular keyboard control, like: the ability to control the camera with the mouse, toggle walking speed, in BotW use MouseWheel to change weapons, a separate Toggle key for ZL useful for locking onto a target â€¦
